pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Aggressive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Jungle Ent Tree.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)N/A$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 18-24 $(item)Jungle Logs$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Jungle Leaves$() or 1-4 $(item)Jungle Saplings$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Vines$() or 1-4 $(item)Cocoa Beans$(), 85%% chance of 1-2 $(item)Diamonds$().

pages.title: Description
pages.text: An ancient like creature made of tribal fury, wood, and flora, The Jungle Ent is a massive creature that stands taller than most mobs in the world, as well as bulkier and stronger than most Jungle Ents are likely the most furious out of every Ent in Chaos Awakens. The tribal fury that rests inside of their bodies allow them to back one heck of a punch. So be careful!
